successes.title: The Tomorrow Girl: Dresden Codak Volume 1
successes.description: The Tomorrow Girl is a collection of the first five years of Dresden Codak, a comic series by Aaron Diaz.

Pledges.description: THE CYBER WARRIOR: A PDF of The Tomorrow Girl.
THE GAMBLER: One random mini-print and a PDF of The Tomorrow Girl.
THE DREAD SCHOLAR: The Dresden Codak Primer, one random Department of Awareness print, all three mini-prints and a PDF of The Tomorrow Girl.
THE BIBLIOMANCER: Silver hardcover of The Tomorrow Girl and a PDF of the book.
THE BOOKMAGE: Silver hardcover of The Tomorrow Girl, The Dresden Codak Primer, all three mini-prints and a PDF of the book.
THE ARCH-BOOKMAGE: Silver hardcover of The Tomorrow Girl with signed bookplate, The Dresden Codak Primer, all three mini-prints and a PDF of the book.
THE KINGMAKER: Limited Gold hardcover of The Tomorrow Girl and a PDF of the book.
THE WARRIOR-KING: Limited Gold hardcover of The Tomorrow Girl, The Dresden Codak Primer, all three mini-prints and a PDF of the book.
THE DRAGONSLAYER: Limited Gold hardcover of The Tomorrow Girl with signed bookplate, The Dresden Codak Primer, all three mini-prints and a PDF of the book.
THE BOOKMAGE-KING: Two books! Silver Hardcover of The Tomorrow Girl, Limited Gold hardcover of The Tomorrow Girl, The Dresden Codak Primer, all three mini-prints and a PDF of the book.
THE IMMORTAL DRAGONSLAYER: Everything in the Dragonslayer tier, with a personal dedication printed in the back of the book.
THE INEFFABLE DRAGONSLAYER: Everything in the Immortal Dragonslayer tier, plus I will draw a personalized illustration in your book!
THE EMPIRIMANCER: Two signed books! Everything in the Dragonslayer tier, plus a copy of the Silver hardcover of The Tomorrow Girl with signed bookplate.
THE ILLUSTRIOUS DRAGONSLAYER: Everything in the Dragonslayer tier, PLUS a personalized illustration in the book!
TINY DRAGONSLAYER: Everything in the Dragonslayer tier, PLUS a personalized illustration in the book, AND a personally commissioned full-color 400x400 pixel avatar I draw for you!
GOLD MERCHANT: 5 Limited Gold hardcovers of The Tomorrow Girl!
SILVER MERCHANT: 10 Silver hardcovers of The Tomorrow Girl!
ELECTRUM MERCHANT: 8 Silver hardcovers and 2 limited Gold hardcovers of The Tomorrow Girl!
THE PALEOMANCER: Everything in the Immortal Dragonslayer tier, plus I will paint a full-color digital image (including a print of it) of your favorite dinosaur!
THE WIZARD-KING: Everything in the Immortal Dragonslayer tier, plus I will paint a full-color digital portrait (including a print of it) of you as an existing Dungeons & Discourse class!

GOD-EMPEROR OF CODAK: Everything in the Immortal Dragonslayer tier, plus I will create for you a personal Dungeons & Discourse character, including a full-color digitally painted portrait of you as the character and a character stat sheet (with prints of both)!
THE OMEGA PACK: Choose any tier reward you like (excluding the merchant tiers), PLUS I will base a Dark Science bureaucrat character on you!
